verses.verse: Listen<WH8085> to me, you that follow<WH7291> after righteousness,<WH6664> you that seek<WH1245> the LORD:<WH3068> look<WH5027> to the rock<WH6697> from where you are hewn,<WH2672> and to the hole<WH4718> of the pit<WH953> from where you are dig.<WH5365>
Look<WH5027> to Abraham<WH85> your father,<WH1> and to Sarah<WH8283> that bore<WH2342> you: for I called<WH7121> him alone,<WH259> and blessed<WH1288> him, and increased<WH7235> him.

For the LORD<WH3068> shall comfort<WH5162> Zion:<WH6726> he will comfort<WH5162> all<WH3605> her waste<WH2723> places; and he will make<WH7760> her wilderness<WH4057> like Eden,<WH5731> and her desert<WH6160> like the garden<WH1588> of the LORD;<WH3068> joy<WH8342> and gladness<WH8057> shall be found<WH4672> therein, thanksgiving,<WH8426> and the voice<WH6963> of melody.<WH2172>

Listen<WH7181> to me, my people;<WH5971> and give ear<WH238> to me, O my nation:<WH3816> for a law<WH8451> shall proceed<WH3318> from me, and I will make my judgment<WH4941> to rest<WH7280> for a light<WH216> of the people.<WH5971>

My righteousness<WH6664> is near;<WH7138> my salvation<WH3468> is gone<WH3318> forth,<WH3318> and my arms<WH2220> shall judge<WH8199> the people;<WH5971> the isles<WH339> shall wait<WH6960> on<WH413> me, and on my arm<WH2220> shall they trust.<WH3176>

Lift<WH5375> up your eyes<WH5869> to the heavens,<WH8064> and look<WH5027> on the earth<WH776> beneath:<WH8478> for the heavens<WH8064> shall vanish<WH4414> away like smoke,<WH6227> and the earth<WH776> shall wax old<WH1086> like a garment,<WH899> and they that dwell<WH3427> therein shall die<WH4191> in like<WH3644> manner:<WH3654> but my salvation<WH3444> shall be for ever,<WH5769> and my righteousness<WH6666> shall not be abolished.<WH2865>

Listen<WH8085> to me, you that know<WH3045> righteousness,<WH6664> the people<WH5971> in whose heart<WH3820> is my law;<WH8451> fear<WH3372> you not the reproach<WH2781> of men,<WH582> neither<WH408> be you afraid<WH2865> of their revilings.<WH1421>

For the moth<WH6211> shall eat<WH398> them up like a garment,<WH899> and the worm<WH5580> shall eat<WH398> them like wool:<WH6785> but my righteousness<WH6666> shall be for ever,<WH5769> and my salvation<WH3444> from generation<WH1755> to generation.<WH1755>

Awake,<WH5782> awake,<WH5782> put<WH3847> on strength,<WH5797> O arm<WH2220> of the LORD;<WH3068> awake,<WH5782> as in the ancient<WH6924> days,<WH3117> in the generations<WH1755> of old.<WH5769> Are you not it that has cut<WH2672> Rahab,<WH7294> and wounded<WH2490> the dragon?<WH8577>

Are you not it which has dried<WH2717> the sea,<WH3220> the waters<WH4325> of the great<WH7227> deep;<WH8415> that has made<WH7760> the depths<WH4615> of the sea<WH3220> a way<WH1870> for the ransomed<WH1350> to pass<WH5674> over?<WH5674>

Therefore the redeemed<WH6299> of the LORD<WH3068> shall return,<WH7725> and come<WH935> with singing<WH7440> to Zion;<WH6726> and everlasting<WH5769> joy<WH8057> shall be on their head:<WH7218> they shall obtain<WH5381> gladness<WH8057> and joy;<WH8057> and sorrow<WH3015> and mourning<WH585> shall flee<WH5127> away.

I, even I, am he that comforts<WH5162> you: who<WH4310> are you, that you should be afraid<WH3372> of a man<WH582> that shall die,<WH4191> and of the son<WH1121> of man<WH120> which shall be made<WH5414> as grass;<WH2682>

And forget<WH7911> the LORD<WH3068> your maker,<WH6213> that has stretched<WH5186> forth the heavens,<WH8064> and laid the foundations<WH3245> of the earth;<WH776> and have feared<WH6342> continually<WH8548> every<WH3605> day<WH3117> because<WH6440> of the fury<WH2534> of the oppressor,<WH6693> as if<WH834> he were ready<WH3559> to destroy?<WH7843> and where<WH346> is the fury<WH2534> of the oppressor?<WH6693>
The captive<WH6808> exile<WH6808> hastens<WH4116> that he may be loosed,<WH6605> and that he should not die<WH4191> in the pit,<WH7845> nor<WH3808> that his bread<WH3899> should fail.<WH2637>
But I am the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> that divided<WH7280> the sea,<WH3220> whose waves<WH1530> roared:<WH1993> The LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> is his name.<WH8034>

And I have put<WH7760> my words<WH1697> in your mouth,<WH6310> and I have covered<WH3680> you in the shadow<WH6738> of my hand,<WH3027> that I may plant<WH5193> the heavens,<WH8064> and lay the foundations<WH3245> of the earth,<WH776> and say<WH559> to Zion,<WH6726> You are my people.<WH5971>

Awake,<WH5782> awake,<WH5782> stand<WH6965> up, O Jerusalem,<WH3389> which<WH834> have drunk<WH8354> at the hand<WH3027> of the LORD<WH3068> the cup<WH3563> of his fury;<WH2534> you have drunken<WH8354> the dregs<WH6907> of the cup<WH3563> of trembling,<WH8653> and wrung<WH4680> them out.

There is none<WH369> to guide<WH5095> her among all<WH3605> the sons<WH1121> whom she has brought<WH3205> forth;<WH3205> neither<WH369> is there any that takes<WH2388> her by the hand<WH3027> of all<WH3605> the sons<WH1121> that she has brought<WH1431> up.

These<WH2007> two<WH8147> things are come<WH7122> to you; who<WH4310> shall be sorry<WH5110> for you? desolation,<WH7701> and destruction,<WH7667> and the famine,<WH7458> and the sword:<WH2719> by whom<WH4310> shall I comfort<WH5162> you?

Your sons<WH1121> have fainted,<WH5968> they lie<WH7901> at the head<WH7218> of all<WH3605> the streets,<WH2351> as a wild<WH8377> bull<WH8377> in a net:<WH4364> they are full<WH4392> of the fury<WH2534> of the LORD,<WH3068> the rebuke<WH1606> of your God.<WH430>
Therefore<WH3651> hear<WH8085> now<WH4994> this,<WH2063> you afflicted,<WH6041> and drunken,<WH7937> but not with wine:<WH3196>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> your Lord the LORD,<WH3068> and your God<WH430> that pleads<WH7378> the cause of his people,<WH5971> Behold,<WH2009> I have taken<WH3947> out of your hand<WH3027> the cup<WH3563> of trembling,<WH8653> even the dregs<WH6907> of the cup<WH3563> of my fury;<WH2534> you shall no<WH3808> more<WH3254> drink<WH8354> it again:<WH5750>

But I will put<WH7760> it into the hand<WH3027> of them that afflict<WH3013> you; which<WH834> have said<WH559> to your soul,<WH5315> Bow<WH7812> down,<WH7812> that we may go<WH5674> over:<WH5674> and you have laid<WH7760> your body<WH1460> as the ground,<WH776> and as the street,<WH2351> to them that went<WH5674> over.<WH5674>
